name: First Time Farmer
description:
This game was a senior project for a 3D animation class. The theme was to make some sort of an educational game that kids could play. The group decided on a game that taught you the basics of farming. 

I wasn't in the class, but I was asked to do the programming by my friend. 

Models, textures, animation by:

Dadong Hu, Gino Manasan, Jonathan Navas, Haruna Takayasu

Programming by:

Yours truly

Controls:

In the shed, press the number for whatever item you need to pick it up.

Press E to use held item.
